block.names: Aoyagi Toya, Shinonome Akito, Azusawa Kohane, Shiraishi An
block.bandinfo: Vivid BAD SQUAD, often abbreviated to VBS and Vivibasu (ビビバス), is a unit of street musicians formed together with the common goal of surpassing the legendary event RAD WEEKEND.

block.names: Akiyama Mizuki, Shinonome Ena, Asahina Mafuyu, Yoisaki Kanade
block.bandinfo: 25-ji, Nightcord de., often abbreviated as 25-ji, N25, and Niigo (ニーゴ), is an underground music circle that makes songs online at 25:00, (1 AM).

block.names: Tenma Saki, Hinomori Shiho, Hoshino Ichika, Mochizuki Honami
block.bandinfo: Leo/need, often abbreviated as L/n and Leoni (レオニ), is an all-female band consisting of four childhood friends.

block.names: Tenma Tsukasa, Kamishiro Rui, Kusanagi Nene, Otori Emu
block.bandinfo: Wonderlands x Showtime, often abbreviated to WxS and Wandasho (ワンダショ, Wondershow), is a musical show unit formed by four part-time actors who perform on the Wonder Stage in Phoenix Wonderland.

block.names: Hinomori Shizuku, Hanasato Minori, Momoi Airi, Kiritani Haruka
block.bandinfo: MORE MORE JUMP!, often abbreviated to MMJ! and Momojan (モモジャン), is an all-female idol group consisting of three once-retired idols and a passionate girl aiming to be an idol.
